hero.subtitle: Vibe Coding · Gym Intelligence
hero.title: MyGym Playbook
hero.lead: Curate your training hubs, stay flexible with weekly scheduling, and keep visibility on every performance arena.

management.title: Gym management
management.description: Create fresh training locations, keep names aligned, and maintain a portfolio that keeps you motivated.
management.cardHint: Ready for sessions with crisp structure, strong lifts, and Vibe Coding craftsmanship.

emptyState: No gyms tracked yet. Add your first location and map your coaching landscape.

highlights.title: Highlights & playbook
items: Blend progression weeks with mobility days to drive sustainable performance.
Schedule re-assessment sessions every six weeks and capture results per gym.
Leverage Vibe Coding reviews to treat training refactors with the same rigor as code.
highlights.closing: Every gym is a commitment: keep routines lean, respect the Law of Demeter for habits, and stay adaptive.

footer: Ready for pro-level delivery · Tests green, lint clean, focus on longevity.
